title: France panorama. [No. 70/25]
brief_description: French cinemagazine items including: 1. Sports - competitors from five nations in the Paris-Strasbourg “walkathon”. 2. Techniques - the new, ultra-modern “Etendard” express train, linking Paris to Bordeaux in four and a half hours. 3. At Arzwiller, a new Moselle River “boat-lift”, doing the work of ten locks. 4. Plane and helicopter rotor-research at the Modane Onera wind-tunnel. 5. The bulls of Camargue - cattle-rustling in Camargue. 6. European art - sponsored by the European Economic Council, an exhibition on “European art in 1925”.
